text: @realDonaldTrump @MikeGarcia2020 @GavinNewsom Keep shtum, you wannabe dictator. Your fascist fantasies stain the office you occupy and sicken all Americans who haven't ceded their brains and spines to your corrupting rule. #TrumpIsALaughingStock #COVID19
